00049 BL_Action::BL_Action(class KX_GameObject* gameobj)
00050 :
00051     m_action(NULL),
00052     m_pose(NULL),
00053     m_blendpose(NULL),
00054     m_blendinpose(NULL),
00055     m_ptrrna(NULL),
00056     m_obj(gameobj),
00057     m_startframe(0.f),
00058     m_endframe(0.f),
00059     m_endtime(0.f),
00060     m_localtime(0.f),
00061     m_blendin(0.f),
00062     m_blendframe(0.f),
00063     m_blendstart(0.f),
00064     m_speed(0.f),
00065     m_priority(0),
00066     m_playmode(0),
00067     m_ipo_flags(0),
00068     m_done(true),
00069     m_calc_localtime(true)
00070 {
00071     if (m_obj->GetGameObjectType() == SCA_IObject::OBJ_ARMATURE)
00072     {
00073         BL_ArmatureObject *obj = (BL_ArmatureObject*)m_obj;
00074 
00075         m_ptrrna = new PointerRNA();
00076         RNA_id_pointer_create(&obj->GetArmatureObject()->id, m_ptrrna);
00077     }
00078     else
00079     {
00080         BL_DeformableGameObject *obj = (BL_DeformableGameObject*)m_obj;
00081         BL_ShapeDeformer *shape_deformer = dynamic_cast<BL_ShapeDeformer*>(obj->GetDeformer());
00082 
00083         if (shape_deformer)
00084         {
00085             m_ptrrna = new PointerRNA();
00086             RNA_id_pointer_create(&shape_deformer->GetKey()->id, m_ptrrna);
00087         }
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 BL_Action::~BL_Action()
00092 {
00093     if (m_pose)
00094         game_free_pose(m_pose);
00095     if (m_blendpose)
00096         game_free_pose(m_blendpose);
00097     if (m_blendinpose)
00098         game_free_pose(m_blendinpose);
00099     if (m_ptrrna)
00100         delete m_ptrrna;
00101     ClearControllerList();
00102 }
00103 
00104 void BL_Action::ClearControllerList()
00105 {
00106     // Clear out the controller list
00107     std::vector<SG_Controller*>::iterator it;
00108     for (it = m_sg_contr_list.begin(); it != m_sg_contr_list.end(); it++)
00109     {
00110         m_obj->GetSGNode()->RemoveSGController((*it));
00111         delete *it;
00112     }
00113 
00114     m_sg_contr_list.clear();
00115 }
00116 
00117 bool BL_Action::Play(const char* name,
00118                     float start,
00119                     float end,
00120                     short priority,
00121                     float blendin,
00122                     short play_mode,
00123                     float layer_weight,
00124                     short ipo_flags,
00125                     float playback_speed)
00126 {
00127 
00128     // Only start playing a new action if we're done, or if
00129     // the new action has a higher priority
00130     if (priority != 0 && !IsDone() && priority >= m_priority)
00131         return false;
00132     m_priority = priority;
00133     bAction* prev_action = m_action;
00134 
00135     // First try to load the action
00136     m_action = (bAction*)KX_GetActiveScene()->GetLogicManager()->GetActionByName(name);
00137     if (!m_action)
00138     {
00139         printf("Failed to load action: %s\n", name);
00140         m_done = true;
00141         return false;
00142     }
00143 
00144     if (prev_action != m_action)
00145     {
00146         // First get rid of any old controllers
00147         ClearControllerList();
00148 
00149         // Create an SG_Controller
00150         SG_Controller *sg_contr = BL_CreateIPO(m_action, m_obj, KX_GetActiveScene()->GetSceneConverter());
00151         m_sg_contr_list.push_back(sg_contr);
00152         m_obj->GetSGNode()->AddSGController(sg_contr);
00153         sg_contr->SetObject(m_obj->GetSGNode());
00154 
00155         // Extra controllers
00156         if (m_obj->GetGameObjectType() == SCA_IObject::OBJ_LIGHT)
00157         {
00158             sg_contr = BL_CreateLampIPO(m_action, m_obj, KX_GetActiveScene()->GetSceneConverter());
00159             m_sg_contr_list.push_back(sg_contr);
00160             m_obj->GetSGNode()->AddSGController(sg_contr);
00161             sg_contr->SetObject(m_obj->GetSGNode());
00162         }
00163         else if (m_obj->GetGameObjectType() == SCA_IObject::OBJ_CAMERA)
00164         {
00165             sg_contr = BL_CreateCameraIPO(m_action, m_obj, KX_GetActiveScene()->GetSceneConverter());
00166             m_sg_contr_list.push_back(sg_contr);
00167             m_obj->GetSGNode()->AddSGController(sg_contr);
00168             sg_contr->SetObject(m_obj->GetSGNode());
00169         }
00170     }
00171     
00172     m_ipo_flags = ipo_flags;
00173     InitIPO();
00174 
00175     // Setup blendin shapes/poses
00176     if (m_obj->GetGameObjectType() == SCA_IObject::OBJ_ARMATURE)
00177     {
00178         BL_ArmatureObject *obj = (BL_ArmatureObject*)m_obj;
00179         obj->GetMRDPose(&m_blendinpose);
00180     }
00181     else
00182     {
00183         BL_DeformableGameObject *obj = (BL_DeformableGameObject*)m_obj;
00184         BL_ShapeDeformer *shape_deformer = dynamic_cast<BL_ShapeDeformer*>(obj->GetDeformer());
00185         
00186         if (shape_deformer && shape_deformer->GetKey())
00187         {
00188             obj->GetShape(m_blendinshape);
00189 
00190             // Now that we have the previous blend shape saved, we can clear out the key to avoid any
00191             // further interference.
00192             KeyBlock *kb;
00193             for (kb=(KeyBlock*)shape_deformer->GetKey()->block.first; kb; kb=(KeyBlock*)kb->next)
00194                 kb->curval = 0.f;
00195         }
00196     }
00197 
00198     // Now that we have an action, we have something we can play
00199     m_starttime = KX_GetActiveEngine()->GetFrameTime();
00200     m_startframe = m_localtime = start;
00201     m_endframe = end;
00202     m_blendin = blendin;
00203     m_playmode = play_mode;
00204     m_endtime = 0.f;
00205     m_blendframe = 0.f;
00206     m_blendstart = 0.f;
00207     m_speed = playback_speed;
00208     m_layer_weight = layer_weight;
00209     
00210     m_done = false;
00211 
00212     return true;
00213 }
00214 
00215 void BL_Action::Stop()
00216 {
00217     m_done = true;
00218 }
00219 
00220 bool BL_Action::IsDone()
00221 {
00222     return m_done;
00223 }
00224 
00225 void BL_Action::InitIPO()
00226 {
00227     // Initialize the IPOs
00228     std::vector<SG_Controller*>::iterator it;
00229     for (it = m_sg_contr_list.begin(); it != m_sg_contr_list.end(); it++)
00230     {
00231         (*it)->SetOption(SG_Controller::SG_CONTR_IPO_RESET, true);
00232         (*it)->SetOption(SG_Controller::SG_CONTR_IPO_IPO_AS_FORCE, m_ipo_flags & ACT_IPOFLAG_FORCE);
00233         (*it)->SetOption(SG_Controller::SG_CONTR_IPO_IPO_ADD, m_ipo_flags & ACT_IPOFLAG_ADD);
00234         (*it)->SetOption(SG_Controller::SG_CONTR_IPO_LOCAL, m_ipo_flags & ACT_IPOFLAG_LOCAL);
00235     }
00236 }

00238 bAction *BL_Action::GetAction()
00239 {
00240     return (IsDone()) ? NULL : m_action;
00241 }
00242 
00243 float BL_Action::GetFrame()
00244 {
00245     return m_localtime;
00246 }
00247 
00248 void BL_Action::SetFrame(float frame)
00249 {
00250     // Clamp the frame to the start and end frame
00251     if (frame < min(m_startframe, m_endframe))
00252         frame = min(m_startframe, m_endframe);
00253     else if (frame > max(m_startframe, m_endframe))
00254         frame = max(m_startframe, m_endframe);
00255     
00256     m_localtime = frame;
00257     m_calc_localtime = false;
00258 }
00259 
00260 void BL_Action::SetPlayMode(short play_mode)
00261 {
00262     m_playmode = play_mode;
00263 }
00264 
00265 void BL_Action::SetTimes(float start, float end)
00266 {
00267     m_startframe = start;
00268     m_endframe = end;
00269 }
00270 
00271 void BL_Action::SetLocalTime(float curtime)
00272 {
00273     float dt = (curtime-m_starttime)*KX_KetsjiEngine::GetAnimFrameRate()*m_speed;
00274 
00275     if (m_endframe < m_startframe)
00276         dt = -dt;
00277 
00278     m_localtime = m_startframe + dt;
00279 }
00280 
00281 void BL_Action::ResetStartTime(float curtime)
00282 {
00283     float dt = (m_localtime > m_startframe) ? m_localtime - m_startframe : m_startframe - m_localtime;
00284 
00285     m_starttime = curtime - dt / (KX_KetsjiEngine::GetAnimFrameRate()*m_speed);
00286     SetLocalTime(curtime);
00287 }
00288 
00289 void BL_Action::IncrementBlending(float curtime)
00290 {
00291     // Setup m_blendstart if we need to
00292     if (m_blendstart == 0.f)
00293         m_blendstart = curtime;
00294     
00295     // Bump the blend frame
00296     m_blendframe = (curtime - m_blendstart)*KX_KetsjiEngine::GetAnimFrameRate();
00297 
00298     // Clamp
00299     if (m_blendframe>m_blendin)
00300         m_blendframe = m_blendin;
00301 }
00302 
00303 
00304 void BL_Action::BlendShape(Key* key, float srcweight, std::vector<float>& blendshape)
00305 {
00306     vector<float>::const_iterator it;
00307     float dstweight;
00308     KeyBlock *kb;
00309     
00310     dstweight = 1.0F - srcweight;
00311     //printf("Dst: %f\tSrc: %f\n", srcweight, dstweight);
00312     for (it=blendshape.begin(), kb = (KeyBlock*)key->block.first; 
00313          kb && it != blendshape.end();
00314          kb = (KeyBlock*)kb->next, it++)
00315     {
00316         //printf("OirgKeys: %f\t%f\n", kb->curval, (*it));
00317         kb->curval = kb->curval * dstweight + (*it) * srcweight;
00318         //printf("NewKey: %f\n", kb->curval);
00319     }
00320     //printf("\n");
00321 }
00322 
00323 void BL_Action::Update(float curtime)
00324 {
00325     // Don't bother if we're done with the animation
00326     if (m_done)
00327         return;
00328 
00329     curtime -= KX_KetsjiEngine::GetSuspendedDelta();
00330 
00331     if (m_calc_localtime)
00332         SetLocalTime(curtime);
00333     else
00334     {
00335         ResetStartTime(curtime);
00336         m_calc_localtime = true;
00337     }
00338 
00339     // Handle wrap around
00340     if (m_localtime < min(m_startframe, m_endframe) || m_localtime > max(m_startframe, m_endframe))
00341     {
00342         switch(m_playmode)
00343         {
00344         case ACT_MODE_PLAY:
00345             // Clamp
00346             m_localtime = m_endframe;
00347             m_done = true;
00348             break;
00349         case ACT_MODE_LOOP:
00350             // Put the time back to the beginning
00351             m_localtime = m_startframe;
00352             m_starttime = curtime;
00353             break;
00354         case ACT_MODE_PING_PONG:
00355             // Swap the start and end frames
00356             float temp = m_startframe;
00357             m_startframe = m_endframe;
00358             m_endframe = temp;
00359 
00360             m_starttime = curtime;
00361 
00362             break;
00363         }
00364     }
00365 
00366     if (m_obj->GetGameObjectType() == SCA_IObject::OBJ_ARMATURE)
00367     {
00368         BL_ArmatureObject *obj = (BL_ArmatureObject*)m_obj;
00369         obj->GetPose(&m_pose);
00370 
00371         // Extract the pose from the action
00372         {
00373             Object *arm = obj->GetArmatureObject();
00374             bPose *temp = arm->pose;
00375 
00376             arm->pose = m_pose;
00377             animsys_evaluate_action(m_ptrrna, m_action, NULL, m_localtime);
00378 
00379             arm->pose = temp;
00380         }
00381 
00382         // Handle blending between armature actions
00383         if (m_blendin && m_blendframe<m_blendin)
00384         {
00385             IncrementBlending(curtime);
00386 
00387             // Calculate weight
00388             float weight = 1.f - (m_blendframe/m_blendin);
00389 
00390             // Blend the poses
00391             game_blend_poses(m_pose, m_blendinpose, weight);
00392         }
00393 
00394 
00395         // Handle layer blending
00396         if (m_layer_weight >= 0)
00397         {
00398             obj->GetMRDPose(&m_blendpose);
00399             game_blend_poses(m_pose, m_blendpose, m_layer_weight);
00400         }
00401 
00402         obj->SetPose(m_pose);
00403 
00404         obj->SetActiveAction(NULL, 0, curtime);
00405     }
00406     else
00407     {
00408         BL_DeformableGameObject *obj = (BL_DeformableGameObject*)m_obj;
00409         BL_ShapeDeformer *shape_deformer = dynamic_cast<BL_ShapeDeformer*>(obj->GetDeformer());
00410 
00411         // Handle shape actions if we have any
00412         if (shape_deformer && shape_deformer->GetKey())
00413         {
00414             Key *key = shape_deformer->GetKey();
00415 
00416 
00417             animsys_evaluate_action(m_ptrrna, m_action, NULL, m_localtime);
00418 
00419             // Handle blending between shape actions
00420             if (m_blendin && m_blendframe < m_blendin)
00421             {
00422                 IncrementBlending(curtime);
00423 
00424                 float weight = 1.f - (m_blendframe/m_blendin);
00425 
00426                 // We go through and clear out the keyblocks so there isn't any interference
00427                 // from other shape actions
00428                 KeyBlock *kb;
00429                 for (kb=(KeyBlock*)key->block.first; kb; kb=(KeyBlock*)kb->next)
00430                     kb->curval = 0.f;
00431 
00432                 // Now blend the shape
00433                 BlendShape(key, weight, m_blendinshape);
00434             }
00435 
00436             // Handle layer blending
00437             if (m_layer_weight >= 0)
00438             {
00439                 obj->GetShape(m_blendshape);
00440                 BlendShape(key, m_layer_weight, m_blendshape);
00441             }
00442 
00443             obj->SetActiveAction(NULL, 0, curtime);
00444         }
00445 
00446         m_obj->UpdateIPO(m_localtime, m_ipo_flags & ACT_IPOFLAG_CHILD);
00447     }
00448 }
